### Notice of Protracted Award
#### Document: Supply of Nano Particle Analyzer
### Document Details

### Documents
- [English Compilation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31516/23-58253_npp_.pdf)
- [French Compilation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31516/23-58253_preavis-d_final.pdf)

### Notice Description
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking to procure a nano particle analyzer for use in a collaborative project. The solicitation includes the following:
* One nano particle analyzer system
* Cartridge starter kit for the system
* Software and hardware for analysis
* Installation, manuals, training, maintenance, and support services
* Optional extended warranty pricing

A detailed technical specification is found in the attached documents, which can be downloaded in English and French.

### Supplier Requirements
- Only Spectradyne LLC is confirmed to be able to provide a system that is compatible with the NRC's existing system and collaboration partner's equipment.

The nano particle analyzer system will be required to meet the technical requirements outlined in the attached documents. Suppliers must ensure that their offer meets the technical specifications outlined.

### Agreement
The procurement method is an Advance Contract Award Notice.

### Evaluation Criteria
- Evaluation will be based on lowest price.

### Trade Agreements
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
